column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Ahhhh ! "
#Text=Asami Sato says : " Oh no !
#Text=I mean I was ju - juuuu I was , I - I , wow .
#Text=That was ... " Wu says : " Wait .
#Text=That was the first thing you said to Asami ?
#Text=You really got ta work on your introductions .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey .
#Text=When you got charm like mine , you do n't need introductions .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hanging out with Asami was awesome .
#Text=But it made things with Korra complicated .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , I was thinking we should spend some time together .
#Text=Look , I really like you and I think we were meant for each other .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , I 'm really sorry , but I just do n't feel the same way about you .
#Text=" Wu says : " That 's harsh , Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " I know .
#Text=And the worst part about it is , it was n't totally true .
#Text="
